title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4034.1 - Duties of starter
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4034.1 - Duties of starter

State Regulations
(a) The starter
shall give all orders necessary for securing a fair start. (b) The starter shall report to the stewards
by whom and by what cause any delay was occasioned and any cases of misconduct
by assistant starters or by jockeys when under the starter's orders. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4034.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
